ComicInfo.Summary:
"THE LIFE AND DEATH OF QUANTUM GIRL"?Who is Quantum Girl and why is she leading The Pact? Her mysterious, time-bending powers send our young heroes spiraling into split timelines and alternate universes, each more dire than the last, but are any of them prepared for the sacrifice it will take to put things right?
Notes:
The cover is a homage of the cover of Giant-Size X-Men #1.
